website_summaries.verdict: Very rugged construction makes it a good choice for working with heavy-duty and lengthy materials.
pros: Design is suited for working with long materials
cons: Some owners report receiving units with missing components and no protective rubber caps on the feet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and assembled this, hasn't seen any use yet but already I'm very happy with this stand. Heavy and feels very sturdy, no wobbling and the roller spins nicely. Assembly is trivial. Box was pretty beaten up, but no damage to the stand itself. Will very likely buy another soon to use as an infeed support for my planer.
customer_reviews.author: VMP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heavy Duty Roller Stand
customer_reviews.text: This roller stand was very easy to assemble and is definitely heavy duty. I have every other flavor of stand and hate them all. They would tip over, turn at an angle and make life cutting 3/4"x4'x8' sheets of plywood a very dangerous activity. This stand does not move unexpectedly and makes me happy and safer. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the quality of this stand. It is well built and incredibly easy to assemble. If there is a downside, it is that adjustments require the use of a hex wrench (included). This is not a negative for me, since I will only be using the stand with one saw. Bottom line is that I would buy it again and am considering getting a second stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with these stands.
customer_reviews.text: Just assembling these stands gives the feel they are heavy duty and will outlast the owner by 100 years. Very well built and and easy to assemble and use. Many others complain about the allen wrench and losing it. I think thats a pretty petty thing to whine about. Easy enough to get a holding strap or even Velcro and attach it to the stand. I doubt anyone is going to be changing the height 15 times a day. Good price on a really good product. Thanks Vestil! Nice to be able to give a 5 star rating on a product these days.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Only drawback is that an allen wrench is needed to make height adjustments. The wrench is included, but knobs would have been better. I use mine for a saw out-feed, so I doubt I will change the height much.
customer_reviews.author: esb

customer_reviews.title: Economical alternative especially if you or your crew are hard on tools.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't perfectly machined but it has withstood amazing weights and a few unnatural side loads. Not sure it's going to last forever, but most shops are so tough on tools they don't have them for years like they used too. conventionally these stands were never this inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: barns

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have levelers on the feet. Also, instead of an Allen Bolt to adjust the height, a knob would be nice - I bought one at my local hardware store. Overall, I'm quite satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Maybe overkill for a hobbyist woodshop but they are the best roller stands I’ve found, very sturdy and easy to assemble. They replace the more typical light weight folding types which I’ve owned and despised for years.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nirenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I welded on an eye hook to ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Good quality. I welded on an eye hook to store the wrench when not in use. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stand
customer_reviews.text: I got a second through the Amazon warehouse but I could see no reason for it and even if banged up I would not have cared. Quite heavy unit and looks like it could support a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: mcjudy

customer_reviews.title: Really stable and roller works great once adjusted
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to adjust the roller so that it would spin freely ( no directions on how to do this). I use it with my table saw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy weight high quality nice roller not like the lower priced units this stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy weight high quality nice roller not like the lower priced units this stand will hold almost a ton! Try that with a 20 dollar stand? Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat heavy cast iron when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat heavy cast iron when it comes to stability. Much more bottom heavy than the hollow tube variety which I seemed to knock over quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Phil 737

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: we place raw material on it to help the band saw puller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Well built, no issues, i will be getting more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Justin kiger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, strong, and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and strong roller stand. In this days when everything seems to be cheaply and flimsily made, I couldn't be happier. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing a support stand for their tablesaw, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my metal band saw i bought two of ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty stand. Works great with my metal band saw i bought two of them really impressed with how heavy duty they are.
customer_reviews.author: The Scrap Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: If you can break this I'd love to see the video.
customer_reviews.text: These are built like tanks. They are very heavy for their size and as such are a bit difficult to fine tune for leveling. I'd give them 4.5 stars for having an allen wrench for height adjustments instead of a half turn binding lever but I can't so I gave five because they work as intended.These are still magnificent for the price. If I can ever find a straight 20' 2x4 these would be much easier to level to my bimetal horizontal band saw.
customer_reviews.author: CPW

customer_reviews.title: A quality product I have two and will buy more ...
customer_reviews.text: A quality product I have two and will buy more in the near future. They are well built and function flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cast iron head assembly and base. Not some flimsy stamped steel roller stand.
customer_reviews.author: mustgroove

customer_reviews.title: to much for it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this but its higher tha they say. So I have to find a way to shorten it.Wish I had my money back!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wall

customer_reviews.title: Vestil STAND-H is very, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. Exactly what I need in my shop. It's heavy, so not very portable. But, if you don't need portability, why would you buy anything else? This cost the same as most of the light weight "woodworking" stands. Even less than some of the light weight stands. A great value and plenty stout with it's 1750 lb capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't need the stand, just the roller but the roller kicks ass
customer_reviews.author: Murray A. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but no feet- no way to contact AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I received the stand from "Amazon Fulfillment Services", but don't exactly know who the distributor is and therein lies a problem. I bought two of the stands and they definitely are strong/sturdy but do not come with rubber feet so it is just metal contacting the shop floor. Seems to me there are parts missing but I don't know who to contact to discuss this problem. There is no shipper and this purchase was not recorded electronically to my account (even though it came to my shipping address). Did you know you can't actually call anyone at Amazon? This is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: drainvk

product_meta.title: Vestil STAND-H 14" Horizontal Deluxe Roller Stand, 23" - 38-1/2" Height, 1760 lbs Capacity
product_meta.description: Designed for use as an extra hand when working with long materials. Each stand includes 2" chrome plated rollers and heavy-duty cast-steel base. Flat single roller design. The height of each stand is adjusted with a friction lock screw or a gas charged cylinder. Great for use in machine and wood shops.
feature_bullets: Easy height adjust for different leveled machines
Light weight construction is easily moved from one location to another
Handy design is used as an extra hand when working with long materials
Cast steel base provides a solid reliable base

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
